Uses of Class
com.dlsc.flexgantt.model.bookmarks.Bookmark

  • Packages that use Bookmark 
    Package Description
    com.dlsc.flexgantt.model.bookmarks
    Paging models are used to allow the user to quickly change the time span that is displayed by the timeline.

    • Uses of Bookmark in com.dlsc.flexgantt.model.bookmarks

      Bookmark BookmarkEvent.getBookmark()
